评论详情: I'm about 5"8 and was worried it would be too short but it's perfect, and can comfortably be worn higher or lower on the waist to hit the perfect length. I love the light fabric and the draw ties at the side make such a pretty silhouette. 10/10 would recommend this skirt.

This skirt is absolutely beautiful! (Especially when worn without the weird poses of the model in the purchase pics, lol!!!) Paired it with a green sweater for Christmas, and a boho belt, and it was stunning! Super comfortable too
I love the style, color and fit. I got a burnt orange color. The fabric is not too heavy, it is soft so the skirt flows.

This skirt is very cheaply made. The color that I received does not look like the color online. The fabric is very cheap. Feeling the stitching is not that great on the top where the elastic band is and it just wasn’t what I was expecting. Hopefully the seller can either reimburse me or give me credits because I am currently living in a rehab facility and I do not have the original packaging anymore and I don’t have transportation now or for when I get out so I won’t be able to return it so I’m counting on the seller to reimburse me or something. Thank you.
This skirt is light weight and so flowy! It’s one size but fits me so well, for reference I wear a size ten. The quality is really nice and I always feel so pretty when I wear it!

I get *so many* compliments on this skirt. Everyone asks me where they can get one. The quality is amazing. I love the color selection and wish I could buy every color. I ended up with the mustard/ golden yellow (can't remember the exact name) and it ended up being the staple of my fall wardrobe. It goes with so many different colors!
This skirt is so cool, I get tons of compliments everytime I wear it! Very comfortable too!
I'm very disappointed in this product. I was looking forward to wearing it. However, after the first wash,  it has white spots on it. What a waste!!!

评论概述: Gorgeous, but not meant for my 5'3" height
评论详情: The good news is, I got it altered so I can wear it. Had to take it up 3 inches. The desert orchid color is so lovely. It was great in summer and I'm planning to wear it in winter too (year round really). The fabric is thick and it's well made.

The skirt I received is not quite the one I ordered from this listing. It's very similar, minus the the ability to cinch/scrunch on the sides. It looks the same as when the skirt in the pictures is let out on the sides. Either way, I absolutely love it. It's beautiful, comfortable, and unique. I love the Thaluta company and their mission of helping street cats. I already ordered another color!

So far I have 3 different colors of this skirt, and each skirt i love and receive many compliments.  It's very comfortable, with a beautiful flow. You can pull the side string as tight or loose as you prefer. I'll definitely be buying more colors..
Nothing but compliments when I wear this skirt. Comfy, great fabric, super flattering, adjustable, what else can you ask for in a skirt?? 12 out of 10
So fun and comfy and a gear material and love the pockets!!!!

I’m not kidding -every time I wear this, I get stoped asking me where I bought it and so many compliments! Love!! I’m 5’2’’ and it scrunched up so it wasn’t dragging on floor when I wore with flat shoes.

评论概述: The best all around skirt ever!
评论详情: Just ordered my second one, simply fabulous. Agree with others, the pocket placement is goofy. Other than that, five stars. It's length is rather silly too, had to cut off 5" and hem to hit my ankle. Easy fix with a sewing machine (I'm 5'7"). Excellent quality cotton, well constructed. Will be ordering a third.
I bought this is in different colors. I can't wear it enough!

评论概述: It’s ok but I’m disappointed in quality. The straps are hidden! Don’t cut the bottom
评论详情: The gathering straps are hidden at the bottom of the pocket hem on the outside facing fabric. I’m disappointed in the pocket size. It’s not the full size of the outer stitching but rather 1/2 of that. Technically, an iPhone 14 Pro Max can fit in it laying sideways and I think not fall out. That’s a big * …. I have pants with pockets and a similar style, and they are much bigger. Since this is basically the same design, I thought they would be the same. On the black skirt, the fabric is very thin, almost see-through. I did expect a slightly thicker, better quality fabric for the price. All in all, I think it’s just OK. I’m considering using it for a Renfaire skirt, but I don’t think it’s good enough quality to wear for every day use.

评论概述: I love this skirt so much!
评论详情: I love this skirt. Have purchased many of the colors. It is thick and looks very nice (if you have small waist). I like it so much, I bought one for my sister too. She is shorter though and a little bigger than me and she did not like how it looks on her.
So pleased with this funky skirt!  It has so much character and originality!  Great style, fit, color, and comfort.

评论概述: I will buy again and again
评论详情: I LLOOOOVEE this skirt!! I am in love with it. I bought a second color for a cruise. I am six feet tall and it is long almost to the ground. Sometimes I trip over with the hem so long and have to lift it up using the strings on the side. Easy to pull and no damage with the use. The material is cotton and easy to iron out the wrinkles. I have never dried in the dryer so I am not sure about shrinkage. I won’t take the chance. Light weight and works well with most things. I wear with converse sneaker or sandals in my hot temperature. This is a must have in a wardrobe. Perfect for women trying to be more modest as well.
Thick but breathable, awesome material and style. I can style it so many ways. I do not regret this purchase.
Cute but not for me.
Every time I wear this skirt,  I get so many compliments. Great for summer and fall.
I am 5' 4" 170lbs and hippy. Did not look right on my body type.

WRITING THIS REVIEW AS I AM FLOWING IN MY BEAUTIFUL SKIRT. IF YOU ARE CONSIDERING BUYING BUY IT! I purchased the red/auburn color.  For my plus size girlies it works!!! Ok i am a thick girl usually wear 18 or 20 in bottoms or XXL And about 2XL or 3XL in tops depending on its cut. I was skeptical purchasing this since it is one size but seriously it so roomy and flowing. There is an elastic band so it stretches however, the waistband is a bit petite. It works perfect for me so i would be mindful if you are heavier in the mid-section. AND BONUSSSSS IT HAS POCKETS, DEEP POCKETS.  This boho style skirt is soooo cute and flowy and perfect on a hot summer day, material almost feels like linen so it is very breathable, also i am only 5'5 so it is long however, i wear it high waist with a cute crop denim shirt.
Love this skirt, it had become a staple. I get so many compliments on it! The color, the style all a+
The ties were sewed into both sides making them not usable. Very disappointing.

评论概述: I'm in love with this skirt!
评论详情: This skirt is so cute and stylish!  I love that I can adjust the length (I like my skirts to graze the floor) to go with whatever shoes I'm wearing.  I'm definitely going to get this is more colors!  It's absolutely beautiful.
The strings will absolutely break within minutes or pulling gently twice.

LOVE this item. Quality is fantastic. Pockets on the side are deep and helpful. You can use the side cords to pull up the sides of the skirt, which I do. Get compliments on this every single time I wear it! It is quite long, and had to hem (I am 5'5") but love it!
Absolutely love this skirt! I get compliments galore and may need a few more colours!
So comfy love this. I will be ordering the pants.
Sadly the elastic in the waist was ridiculously tight. So disappointed…if this was a drawstring that would be the best!
Love this skirt! Very good quality fabric and stitching. Will order more in the future.

I love, love,love this skirt. It’s the perfect skirt for anyone. It’s not cheaply made the material is great and it’s very flattering on. I ordered me another in black. Buy it you won’t be disappointed!

Great skirt and so fun! Wore it to work yesterday and got lots of compliments! It is a OS, however good, waist could be a smidgen bigger and where the drawstrings pull up the sides, grommets would be a good reinforcement for the holes that the drawstrings pull through. Otherwise, beautifully made skirt and comfortable fabric! Five Stars!

I wish it had a drawstring to cinch in the waste. It is a cute skirt but I am 5’3 and it will cost me more money to get it shortened now. I don’t know if it is worth that. Even with an avg heel still too long for me
I love these skirts more so then a maxi skirt. The colors are beautiful and I love the fit.

Beautifully made comfortable skirt. It is a weighty cotton that flows nicely. Please read full description. There is a pull on base of bottom of pocket. This adjusts ruching on sides. Additionally this company helps the street cats of Thailand. PLEASE READ ALL INFO.

I am in love with the 2 skirts I received today. The style is nothing normal or average and the quality is great. I was so happy with the skirts, I bought 3 more (different) skirts today from your brand. Thank you for making great skirts!

I can’t wait to wear this fun skirt!  It is so cute on and the material is really nice!  My girlfriend bought it in green and thought it was missing the strings to cinch but no they are just hidden.  This is really so cute on and I think the styling possibilities are endless.
This is exactly as advertised. I love it- I got the olive green ~ so pretty!!!!!

This skirt is everything that it is in the picture. The length hovers over the ground and the cinch up sides under the oversize pockets are a dream. The color is perfect and as described in the description.  The "it" skirt of this season.  I rate this skirt 10/10.

评论概述: Thaluta Women's Maxi Boho Skirt with Pockets Bohemian Organic Cotton Hippie Gypsy
评论详情: Product is not has described or seen on the pictures.  The skirt was missing ruching (gathering) effect on the sides which for me was what attracted me to the skirt.

The quality of the workmanship and teal color are excellent, the style is unique in that instead of just a gathered full skirt, you have the option to shorten the sides with a drawstring at the pockets. Very billowy cotton is cool for summer heat and has enough weight to hang nicely.

I love the fabric, I love the color i love the skirt, however the ties were not present so there was no way to cinch the skirt. Now the skirt is sold out.....booooooo! I hope it comes back in stock soon.
Billed as one size for 4-14 but I wear a size 13 and felt like a sausage in casing…

I absolutely adore this skirt! I thought it wouldn’t fit because I’m on a weight loss journey. I’m 5’8” and 205lbs but it’s still perfect!! After this review I’m going to buy another one in a different color! Love it!
I love this skirt. It’s my absolute favorite. It’s so comfortable.
This shirt can be dressed up or can be a just kicking vibe. I couldn't make up my mind on what color to purchase, so I bought 2 and I'm glad that I did.  The quality is also another plus.
I accidentally got lemon juice on it and it took the dye out immediately. Looks awful now.

I LOVE IT!!! I’ve worn it as a skirt & dress. I’m actually knitting a springtime light sweater to match it with Knitting For Olive yarn & mohair. Seems it’s selling out as I wanted to buy 2 other colors but their unavailable. Hope they make more. By the way the stitching is very sturdy especially the drawstring & the very deep awesome pockets. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMENDED “truly handmade” garment.
I wore it to woek on a Friday dress down day Compliments! Where n how much did it cost!

*UPDATE* listing says organic cotton however tag does NOT state organic, so that is misleading.  However I really like this skirt, but the color was a LOT more pink than the photos made it look so I returned it and ended up getting one in another color that worked much better.
The skirt is absolutely as described you do have to realize that the strings on the pocket can tighten or loosen your look. Will order another right now!
Make sure you hunt for the strings that pull the sides up to give it sort if this look. But, it still doesn't look right.

I read all the reviews and was worried but bought it anyway. I absolutely love this skirt! It’s exactly as pictured. I am buying a couple more. Love it!! I bought the pinkish color. It’s not “easter” pink, it’s boho pink. So beautiful!
I liked it very much.

I was thrilled when this eco friendly brand was on Amazon. I like how the size is so inclusive and the material is suited for winter or warmer weather. This is such a great price for a sustainable clothing item.
Color is bold. Cotton is soft. Adore the pockets and how they appear over sized!!! Nicely made. Fits well
I love this skirt! Even at 4’11”, it fits great!

评论概述: Will fit, Will look great, order it.
评论详情: I am 5'3, 160 lbs, and this skirt is flattering and practical with the large pockets. It was to the floor exactly on me without cinching up the sides which I plan to do but you could leave it long if you prefer.
I LOVE this skirt. It is light and airy. In the winter I can wear it with tights and be comfortable. I love the pockets, the good quality fabric ND the adjustable length. Highly recommend.

I love the style and fit of the skirt, but the first time I tried to scrunch the sides, one of the straps broke and the other one is hanging on by literal threads. I was expecting better quality with the price. Makes me sad because I loooove the style and the brand. Maybe just need a little more quality control.
Super comfy and cute and it has pockets

About 12 inches past my feet ( I am 5’4”).  Pockets are oddly set and down to my knees.  Too long to just turn up the hem; it really needs to come up at the waist (which fits ) and up at the bottom a lot.  Might fit someone about 6 ft tall.

I absolutely love this skirt. Like others have mentioned, the cinch strings are just under the pockets. The length after cinching is perfect! The color is beautiful! The waist is comfortable and stretchy. For reference I'm 5'6" 167lbs 42" hips 33" waist Generally wear a size Large or 12
Love this skirt! I got so many compliments on it! Great for festivals and very flattering. Fit and color are true to image !
This skirt is absolutely beautiful! I love it and great quality for the price
Love it but I had to pull out my sewing making and repair some loose stitching and busted seams

评论概述: One size does NOT fit all
评论详情: I am 5'6 with a 36" waist and if I wear this at my waist (I generally like them below waist) I trip on the hem. And it "fits" my waist but it's uncomfortably tight.  So this really only fits someone who is +5'8" and thin.  Even just putting in a draw string around the waist would help it "actually" fit more people.Five stars for large pockets but they're on the very sides, so kinda far back....Weight is decent...
100 % algodón, divino color y diseño divina con botas , me encantó!!!!!
Fit well. I'm short, but was able to hike up sides so I didn't trip. Great color and style.
Super cute. Super comfy. And it can look casual or throw on some heels or boots to dress it up. Perfect material. Perfect length. And it an original style.

评论概述: Quality is not worth the price
评论详情: I bought the green version of this skirt a couple of years ago and always get compliments on it. It’s very comfy and the fabric is of good quality. I just got the black version and the quality is significantly worse. This is definitely not worth the price tag now and I am extremely disappointed in the shortcuts this company is now using to create cheaper products for more money. The fabric is that cheap almost plastic feeling one that companies like shein would use. Do not recommend

评论概述: I’ve bought a few pairs of these
评论详情: I love this skirt so much, it’s so cute. It’s breathable, it’s very long so i usually pull it up to my sternum. I’m in love with it, i’ve bought a few pairs in different colors.
It’s a cute skirt, but the cotton is not as soft as I would like it to be. I’ll wash it, maybe it’ll soften up. These pictures can be very deceiving.
I have several items from this shop. Great quality and look. I have this skirt it two colors. I always have people comment on it when I wear it.
Nice fabric and fit as described.
Loved skirt but waistline needs to be adjustable
The gathering is a little heavy but is handy when walking

The little model on the site looks super cute in that tropical setting wearing the skirt. I'm a cookie baking granny with a ranch...not nearly as cute, but this skirt certainly is. I love everything about it. I can go from feeding the cattle, to the butcher shop and then into the kitchen in this thing, and it's so much more comfortable than binding jeans. I LOVE the big pockets, the drawstrings, and the 100% cotton fabric.

I was hesitant in purchasing this. I finally did and love it. I’m 5ft 8inch size12 34 inch inseem I bought the emerald green. It actually hits my ankles, I will not be putting in dryer. For reference the pull is at the bottom of pocket kind of hidden. The Cotten  is the kind that can be ironed not tshirt material, love it! I’m wearing with a black this cable waist cropped sweater and western boots at the moment. On myself I like it best with any fitted shirt. Shoes I’ve tried I have liked so far, boots, Birkenstock sandals, doc martens.. so basically everything!

After reading many reviews I decided to purchase to use as part of a costume I was going to wear on vacation for halloween. I mainly went with it for the large pockets. Well once the skirt arrived I was shocked how nice the fabric was. I am 5'2", 127 lbs and I found once I used the ties on the side the skirt just grazed the ground. Which was not bad for the activities I had planned during the day. That evening was a different a story. I wore the skirt sneakers as if you have ever been to Bourbon St in New Orleans you now the streets are covered in puddles of who knows what. LOL.  So being my height, the skirt did get wet unfortunately. I think now I am home wearing this skirt with boots or docs this winter will be great and next summer with a heal or sandals  will be fine. I washed and hung dry and it has maintained it's color and shap. Very pleased and surprised honestly and happy with this purchase. I purchased in black and am debating buying another color.
Very thick fabric and sturdy. Fits well

This skirt is so comfy and beautiful! It goes well with sneakers and boots. I have it in three colors and receive compliments on them everywhere I go. My only complaint is that the price increased by ten dollars from purchasing my first skirt three months ago.

评论概述: Good for tall ladies and has pockets!
评论详情: I'm 6'1" and this is long enough for me!!  It's GORGEOUS.  If you get it, please take a good look where the draw strings are to rouche up the sides. I didn't see those at first and the skirt looked a little goofy, but when I found them, I pulled them and then the skirt came alive and the cut made total sense. And the POCKETS are generously sized!

I got these skirts in multiple colors, I knew I would be obsessed before they even arrived!! They are unbelievably comfortable, and so beautiful & feminine, definitely gives off an “Oops, am I accidentally gorgeous today?” kinda vibe;) I wasn’t sure the skirt would fit me because I have a 23in waist,  & I knew I wanted to wear it high waisted!  It actually does fit, loosely, but the belt helps keep it in place! I’m 5’3 and love the long length, I typically wear some height in my shoes , even my flip flops are at least 2 inch wedges, so it works with anything I wear!I love that you can dress it up, or lose the belt & bum around your house in it!! Totally versatile for all seasons too!! I’ll use the heck out of these!!
This was exactly the style I was looking for. Boho and functional. The pockets are great. I want one in every color!!!
This is my favorite skirt! I never ever wear dresses or skirts but I absolutely love this! I bought 3! Very good quality.

评论概述: I returned they have not issued my refund it is in transit.
评论详情: At first, I thought I would have to return it, but then I realized you can pull the string on each side and adjust it! Yayy!! so after that, I ordered two more! I wound up returning one of the colors that I didn’t like but this black skirt and the orange one is so amazing I just didn’t like the green one personally! Comfy and badass!
Usually when a skirt says one size it really isn't, but this skirt really is that flexible. Comfy, long enough, linen-feel fabric, sturdy, and looks great.
I really like, live the color, fits perfectly. I did it right.

I have the tan & the forest green I get a ton of compliments on them every time I wear them. I love being able to pull up the sides. They are breathable and very cool in hot weather. I am also plus size & tall (sz 16-18, 5'8) and it is long enough and fits!! OSFM usually does not include me, but this really fits and is comfortable!! I wash gentle on cold and line dry and have no issues with shrinking. I will wear them for many years and often!
One size does NOT fit all. Love the skirt hate how they assume on size is satisfactory for all body types. Be warned, unless you are a size 10 or less, its going to choke you to death.

Absolutely LOVE this skirt! But would suggest to the makers move the pockets forward. They sit too far back to easily put hands in them or put items in pockets. I wear it reversed to make it easier to carry things in pockets without having to constantly "search" for the opening. LOVE the color, look and feel though. Just the pocket placement needs adjusting.
This was PERFECT for my renaissance cosplay. It was so hot outside but the skirt was light enough that I wasn't melting. Super comfortable as well. Nice sized pockets. Very happy with this one.
Skirt is super comfortable and fabric is very breathable. The only complaint is the color is more red than purple. Otherwise I love this skirt. I will probably buy more in other colors in the future.

This really does not have the string in the pockets to make it gather at the sides. Or at least the version that was sent to me doesn’t. The material is decent and I like to color a lot so I kept it, but I do wish I could hate her it at the sides as the photos show.

I love it. I got this skirt and another one size dress from the same brand and I love them both. I love that I can fluctuate sizes and these will fit. I am a jeans and t kind of girl, but if I went minimal this would be taking the place of those without a doubt. Very versatile, can be paired to boho, steampunk, grunge maybe... I don't know about it being super dressy for some styles but it is great quality and super comfortable. Cotton, pockets, one size fits all. It's perfect.
